sqlMap.insert: insert into spectrumboard ( SPECBRD_SRLNMBR, SPECBRD_LIKENUM, SPECBRD_PARENTSERIALNUM, MEMBER_ID, SPECBRD_DATE, SPECBRD_CN, SPCTATC_ID )values( SPECTRUMBOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, '0', #specbrdParentserialnum#, #memberId#, sysdate, #specbrdCn#, '-1' )
sqlMap.select: select A.SPECBRD_SRLNMBR, A.SPECBRD_LIKENUM, A.SPECBRD_PARENTSERIALNUM, A.MEMBER_ID, A.SPECBRD_CN, A.SPECBRD_DATE, b.MEMBER_NICKNAME from spectrumboard A, member b where A.MEMBER_ID=B.MEMBER_ID and A.SPECBRD_SRLNMBR=#specbrdParentserialnum# order by TO_NUMBER(SPECBRD_SRLNMBR) desc
sqlMap.update: update spectrumboard set SPECBRD_DATE=sysdate, SPECBRD_CN=#specbrdCn# where SPECBRD_SRLNMBR=#specbrdSrlnmbr#
